title: List of apocalyptic films
html:
List of apocalyptic films

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Jump to navigation Jump to search

This is a list of apocalyptic feature-length films. All films within this list feature either the end of the world, a prelude to such an end (such as a world taken over by a viral infection), and/or a post-apocalyptic setting.

Contents

  • 1 Pre-1950
  • 2 1950–1959
  • 3 1960–1969
  • 4 1970–1979
  • 5 1980–1989
  • 6 1990–1999
  • 7 2000–2009
  • 8 2010–2019
  • 9 2020-2029
  • 10 See also

paragraphs.text: This is a list of apocalyptic feature-length films. All films within this list feature either the end of the world, a prelude to such an end (such as a world taken over by a viral infection), and/or a post-apocalyptic setting.
